summary: Planet Express sees a hostile takeover and Bender falls into the hands of criminals where he is used to fulfill their schemes.
cast: Billy West|Katey Sagal|John DiMaggio|Tress MacNeille|Maurice LaMarche|Phil LaMarr|Lauren Tom|David Herman|Dawnn Lewis|Kath Soucie|Frank Welker|Coolio|Al Gore|Mark Hamill|Tom Kenny|Sarah Silverman|The Hypnotoad
title: Futurama - El gran golpe de Bender
